mapper.insert: insert into member_table(memberID, memberPw,memberName, memberAge, memberGender, memberEmail ,memberProfile) values(#{memberID}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberAge}, #{memberGender}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberProfile})
mapper.select: select * from member_table where memberID=#{memberID} and memberPw=#{memberPw}
mapper.update: update member_table set memberProfile = #{memberProfile} where memberID = #{memberID}
